paragraphs: Hi! I'm Jeremy. I'm a front end software developer that specializes in JS, CSS, Python, and recently TypeScript. I also have a secondary interest in automation via Jenkins and Python.
Currently, I work at Microsoft Canada, but my previous experience includes Electronic Arts and BlackBerry.
I am driven to solve problems by improving code maintainability and eliminating tech debt. My ideal work environment is one where I can challenge myself to constantly improve.
So if you need something built, I build things.
